nodes.text: Revenge of the Sith Read-Along Storybook and CD

Revenge of the Sith Read-Along Storybook and CD is a young readers' story from Disney–Lucasfilm Press, released on March 7, 2017. It presents an illustrated version of the story of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith with an accompanying CD with narration of the story and character voices.
Relive all of the excitement of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith in this illustrated storybook-and-CD set
